K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:1b-1: shr'i badzra manda aa lam ka ra n'a ma ma h'a tantra r'a dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:1b-2: bod skad du; dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:1b-3: bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi padma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:1b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:1b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2a-4: las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna @2b tshogs mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-1: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-2: thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-4: kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-5: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi 'phan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-6: me tog gi chun po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-7: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-8: chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzang 'od mtha' yas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:2b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-1: kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-3: mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-4: rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med khang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-0: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi @3b rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-10: yongs su dkar ba; chos thams cad kyi tshul yongs su dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-11: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-13: rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-14: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-16: las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-17: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-18: sku chen po rdo rje'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-20: sku rin po che chos kyi sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-22: chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-23: byang chub kyi sems don yod pa; yongs su bsdus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:3b-25: rgyal po chen po snang ba'i me tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4a-9: ye shes can; khyab bdag chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4a-10: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su grong pa rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4a-13: gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs @4b pa can; rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-1: rin chen tog de 'od byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-2: 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-3: don yod pa ni las kun byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ye shes la rab tu gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shas gnyis su med pa brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-9: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-16: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-17: sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:4b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-0: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang @5a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-1: phyug gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-3: khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brdabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-9: buddha sa m'a dza a'a: h'a: aom h'um badzra sa m'a dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-10: de nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin khyab par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-12: de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros kyis ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams @5b cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-3: kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-8: bh'um/ de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-9: rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-11: don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-12: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-13: zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlabs par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-15: zhal bzhi po rnams las chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-16: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:5b-18: lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-2: dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-3: 'di ltar byang chub sems pa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-4: sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-5: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-6: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-7: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-8: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-10: gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-12: nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-15: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-16: yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-19: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-20: lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-21: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-22: ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-23: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6a-24: yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-0: 'di ltar byang @6b chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-1: gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-2: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-3: sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-4: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-5: dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-6: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-7: ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni; 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-8: reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-10: dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-14: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-15: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-18: gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-19: sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-20: thams cad gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-21: bstan pa la rdzi ba med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:6b-25: gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan gcig tsam yang thos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-1: byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-2: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-4: las kyi sgrib pa chen po thams cad nye bar bsags kyang nam yang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-5: gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-7: nyi ma re re 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-9: rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-10: skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-11: chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-14: h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7a-15: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-0: don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang @7b chub chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-1: rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-2: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-4: gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di thos nas nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-8: ji srid byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa yang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-9: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-10: aam; de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-11: 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-12: zhe sdang gi spro ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-13: gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-14: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:7b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-0: @8a *// gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-1: des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-2: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-3: h'um; de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-4: 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-5: 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-6: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8a-7: 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-0: 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid @8b yin no; ;'jam dpal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-1: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed pa 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-2: de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang padma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-3: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-5: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-6: dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-7: don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-8: chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-9: zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-11: yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:8b-13: tr'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-0: thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya @9a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-1: ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-3: gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-4: thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i dan du 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-5: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-6: 'jam dpal; gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-7: des dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-8: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-11: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-12: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9a-14: a'a:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-0: rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor ba'i @9b phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-1: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-2: smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-5: a'am/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-6: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-7: don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'dug par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-8: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-9: las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:9b-11: h'um/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-1: kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-2: sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-3: chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-9: sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-11: aom/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-12: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-13: sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-14: sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid bas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-15: sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10a-17: 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-0: ha:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i @10b de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-1: thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-2: thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-3: chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-4: thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-6: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-8: rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-9: rin po che thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-10: ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:10b-11: las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-0: hr'i:/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de @11a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-1: bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-7: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-9: dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-0: chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha @11b rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-2: dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-4: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-5: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-7: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-9: svam/ de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-10: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-11: mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-12: de srid mnyam med sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:11b-13: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-2: ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-3: las ni thams cad rnam dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-4: srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-5: chags sogs rab ldan 'jig rten ni; ;kun nas srid par sdig byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-6: de dag rnam par sbyang don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-8: ji ltar padma legs dmar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-9: dmar ba'i skyon gyis ma gos ltar; ;bag chags skyon gyi srid pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-11: 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-12: bde ba chen po nor chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-13: khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-14: de dag don ni brtan par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-16: gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid nyin re bzhin du nang par langs te gang 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-21: yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-23: h'um/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-25: nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-26: nges par shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-28: aom na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12a-30: aom sa manta bha dra ts'a rye dhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-3: aom dz'a ti pa ri wa ra te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-4: aom mah'a r'a g'a dharma te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-7: aom badzra dri dha: ka wa tsi te h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-10: aom pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a dzny'a na bi shuddhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-11: aom karmma bi sho dha ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-12: aom ni sum bha badzri h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-15: aom h'um sarba g'a ma n'i aom hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-16: aom a'a k'a ro mu khe aom pra dzny'a pa ra mi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-17: aom aa ma h'um aom aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya aa gre /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'ak bi sho dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzre aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-21: aom spho ta ya sarb'a pa ya bighnam ni pra moksha ya sarb'a pa ya ga ti bhya: sarba sa ma ya badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-22: sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-23: de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-24: de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:12b-33: mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-0: gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung du na yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas sems can de sangs rgyas @13a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-1: mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-2: slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs pa lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-4: sems can gang la la gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-8: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-9: sa'i khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-11: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bzung ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-12: glegs bam du bris par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-13: de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-14: de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-15: rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-16: gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-20: tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-21: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-22: mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-24: 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal @13b 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-2: mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-4: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-5: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-6: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-7: spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-8: thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad shin tu gsal bas snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:13b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-1: cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba bshad par bya'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-3: de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-6: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po la rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs par byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-7: de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te byin gyis brlabs nas de las thon te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-10: rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-11: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-12: dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-13: rdo rje snying po gsang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-0: rdo rje snying po dang @14b mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-1: khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-3: gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-5: rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-6: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-7: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-8: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-9: dar dang me tog chun pos spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-10: gra yi cha ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-11: sgo 'gram dang ni mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-12: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-13: nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-14: de yi phyi rol tu bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-15: dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-16: sgo khyud du ni rin chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-17: mchog tu rmad byung gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-18: rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-19: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-20: rdo rje ka ba'i mdun bzhag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-21: bum pa la sogs dag gis spras; ;tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-22: rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-23: ra ba ra ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-24: ri bo gnyis kyi phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-25: sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-26: khyad par ji bzhin bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-27: nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam bzhir bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-28: gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-29: gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-30: zla ba phyed pa'i tshul 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-32: de yi nang gi cha la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-33: padma lo ma brgyad pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-34: de ltar shes rab chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-35: slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-36: de yi rjes su lha rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:14b-37: go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-2: gzi brjid dra ba rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-3: dam tshig mchog gi rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-4: slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams su bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-5: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-6: dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-7: mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-8: rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-9: mi bskyod ba yi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-10: zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-11: der ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-12: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-13: rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-14: shes rab chen pos dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-15: rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-17: rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-19: rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-20: don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-21: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-22: dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-23: rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-24: dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-25: rdo rje snying po rgyal po che; ;khyab bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-26: 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-27: 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-28: blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-29: byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-30: nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-31: kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15a-32: phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-0: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs @15b kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-1: sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-2: sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-3: de nang sa yi snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-4: nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-5: lag na rin chen bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-6: mi phan pa kun 'joms pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-7: dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-8: dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-10: 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-11: blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-12: shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-13: phyag rgya go rim bzhin du dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-14: 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs ris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-15: rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-16: gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-17: rdo rje padmas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-18: lhung bzed dang ni 'khar gsil dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-19: chos gos kyang ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-22: gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-23: de rnams blo ldan brtan pas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-24: byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-25: phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-26: padma autpal nyi dang ni; ;spyi blugs pags pa'i g-yang gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-27: dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-28: ma myos pa ru bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-29: slar yang lho ru song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-30: phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-31: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-32: phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-33: rdo rje panti sha dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-34: dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-35: dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:15b-36: dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-3: dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-4: 'jam dpal dbyangs ni blo gros kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-5: gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-6: brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-8: ral gri yang ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-9: thod pa dang ni dgra sta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-10: rma bya dang ni seng+ge nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-12: mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-13: 'khor lo'i grva ni legs gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-14: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-15: phyi yi 'khor lo'i grva ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-16: rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs; ;bdag nyid che po 'bad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-17: mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-18: phyi yi dkyil 'khor grva rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-19: gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-20: gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni; ;khyad par du ni ro dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-21: reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-22: mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-23: sgo yi nang ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-24: sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-25: de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-26: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-27: go rim bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-28: yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-29: nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-30: sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-31: shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-32: phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-33: ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16a-34: thams cad shar du dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-0: de nas blo gros ldan pa @16b yis; ;byang gi phyogs su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-1: gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-2: khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-3: khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-4: mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-5: de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-6: bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-7: de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-8: gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-9: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-10: lho yi phyogs su rab phyin la; ;m'a ma k'i dang lcags sgrog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-11: khab rtse rdo rje mtshan mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-12: de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-13: nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-14: der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-15: sgra gcan stobs chen bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-16: de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-18: dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-19: lha mo nye ba'i skra can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-20: 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-21: rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-22: 'gugs byed pho nya lnga dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-23: gra yi cha ru bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-24: rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-25: sgo yi nang ni thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-26: sgo skyong ba ni rnam par bri; ;gzhan gyi mi thub lha mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-27: de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-28: rdo rje dregs ma lha mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-29: rdo rje kumbhi yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-30: de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-31: thams cad las ni thon nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-32: shar gyi cha ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-33: sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-34: khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-35: de bzhin mi g-yo zhes bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:16b-36: khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-1: bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-2: shar du bris nas sngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-3: de nas byang gi char song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-4: rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-5: skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o; ;khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-6: khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-7: pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-8: ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-9: 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to; ;de nas blo gros ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-10: lho yi phyogs su song nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-11: der ni phyin te brtson chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-12: khro bo chen po stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-13: rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-14: shes rab chen pos dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-15: khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-16: de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-17: sgra gcan khro bo stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-18: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-20: de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-21: rkang pas bsnun pa'i rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-22: gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-23: bran dang pho nya khro bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-24: stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-25: de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-26: nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-27: der ni song ste brtson chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-28: gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-29: gdong drug pa la lag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-30: khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-31: khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-32: bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-33: dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17a-34: khro bo gtum po thams cad bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-0: de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas @17b su; ;rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-1: dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-2: de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-3: rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-4: de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-5: dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-6: dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-7: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-8: gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-9: rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-10: de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-11: mtha' bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-13: tshangs pa mthun na 'don pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-26: gya nom snang ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-27: shin tu mthong ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-29: dag pa'i gnas rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-30: de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-34: bden bral du bden bral dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:17b-37: lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-0: phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya @18a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-2: lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-3: nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-4: byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-5: phyi rol tu ra ba dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-6: de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-7: de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-8: sgo bzhi pa dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-9: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-11: dra ba phyed pas sgrubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-12: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-13: de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i steng du rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshogs mchod la mnyes par byas te; mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-17: bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas nam mkha'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18a-18: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-0: rdo rje sems @18b dpa'i bdag nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-1: rnam par snang mdzad nga'o snyam du snyems pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-2: de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems dpa' h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad h'um gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag pa byas nas se gol gyi sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-4: kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang bcas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-6: de la de'i snying po bzhi po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-8: aam aa: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas brjod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-10: bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:18b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-4: sarba bo dhi satva pa ri bri t'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-5: pra tye ka ri ha ha te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra yo gi shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-13: dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-16: gzugs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-18: las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-20: su ra ta badzra badzra satva dza: h'um bam ho: aa dhi tishthantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-21: sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a manda lam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-22: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-0: de bzhin @19b gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-1: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-2: bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-3: ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyi brlab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-5: de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-6: de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-9: sa ma ya badzra aa dhishtha nam ku ru m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-10: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ye shu me ya dhi tishthantu sarba buddha m'am pra be sha yantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-11: pra ti p'a la yantu; p'u dz'anytsa me pra yantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra mandal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-14: aa lam k'a re ma h'a badzra manda le pra ti ba la yantu m'am stu dz'anytsa me pra yatstshantu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-15: de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:19b-16: sor mo'i rtsa mor me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-1: dzrum ba: ka: pram khim shrim dzrum ham mam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-3: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya stva pra bi sh'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-4: de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g-yogs bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-5: sngags ni; sa ma yo ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-8: gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-9: de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-13: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-17: bi kri ta bi dyu dzdzi hv'a dur d'anta da ma ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-18: ha si ta lambo da ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-28: badzra damshta kinytsi r'a ya si pra bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-29: badzra p'a ni hri da ya m'a bi sha m'a bi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-32: ghurn'a pa ya ghurn'a pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-33: bhra ma ya bhra ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-34: p'a ta ya mo ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-39: sarba ta th'a ga ta dz'a ka ra pra ba ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-42: he he badzra dzham k'a ra h'um kri ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-44: de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba'i ma mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20a-45: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-1: mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-3: de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su bzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-4: seng+ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-5: de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-7: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-19: glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ste; aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzroshn'i sha aa bhi shinytsa aom badzra stva aa bhi shinyca /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-21: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-22: aom badzra padma aa bhi shinytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-23: aom badzra badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-29: rked pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:20b-30: rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-0: de nas rdo rje'i cho ga rnams brlab @21a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-2: de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-4: rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-5: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-6: ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-7: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-9: h'um/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par rig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-11: aom/ 'dod chags kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-13: zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-14: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-16: gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i mtha' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-17: rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-19: ram/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-20: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa yid la 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-21: sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21a-23: hr'im/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-0: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa @21b la 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-1: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-4: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-7: aom/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-8: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-10: aam/ bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-11: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:21b-27: chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-0: @22a *// kham/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-2: bdag gi de nyid dang brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-3: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-4: de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-5: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-24: h'um/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22a-26: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-2: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-6: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-7: de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-8: rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-10: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-12: legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-13: phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyi; ;dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-14: gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-15: dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-16: gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-17: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-18: gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-19: dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-20: gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-21: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-22: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-23: de ni yang dang yang du bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-24: chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-25: mdor bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-26: rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-27: dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-28: legs par rab gnas 'od zer can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-30: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:22b-32: gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-2: de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-3: lhag pa'i lha ni gcig bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-4: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-5: rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-6: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-8: sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-9: bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-14: rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-17: chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-20: chos thams cad kyi sgo ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-24: chos thams cad kyi ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-27: chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23a-31: zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-3: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-4: zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-6: skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-9: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-12: las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-15: sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-16: dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-17: shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-20: zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-25: 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:23b-31: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-0: @24a *// gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-3: g-yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-6: chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-9: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-12: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-15: myur du 'chi ba med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-18: lus rnam par spyod pa 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyis sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24a-21: sems rnam par spyod pa nyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-0: bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi @24b sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-3: ngag rnam par spyod pa ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-6: grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-9: gcig tu 'dis pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-12: ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-15: chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-18: dgra chen po las grol ba'i mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-21: tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:24b-24: chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-0: rgyun du byed pa nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye @25a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-1: bar gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-4: de kho na nyid spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-7: ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-8: aom h'um; hr'i zhes bya ba ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-11: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni; mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-12: aom ka kha ga gha nga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-13: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-14: aom tsa tsha dza dzha nya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-16: gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-17: aom ta tha da dha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-19: chos thams cad gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-20: aom ta tha da dha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-22: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-23: aom pa pha ba bha ma; byang chub ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25a-24: chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-0: glo bur ba thams cad nges par @25b dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-1: chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-3: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-9: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-10: de yi steng du padma bzhag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-19: bskal mthar yang ni de gnas 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-20: bha ga chen po rnal 'byor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-21: rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-22: sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-23: sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:25b-24: khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-1: cad du; ;gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-2: de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-3: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-4: gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa; ;gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-5: de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:26a-10: phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so //
