K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-19: blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-20: kun nas shes rab chen po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-21: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-22: gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-23: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-24: gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-25: re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-26: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-27: nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-28: lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-29: thams cad rig pas brtan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-30: shin tu dri med byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-31: rang snying me long lta bur bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-32: de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-33: mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:72b-34: bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-2: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-3: de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-4: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-5: nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'bab; ;'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-6: ji snyed yod pa de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-7: 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-8: dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-9: aom ga ga na ganytsa gam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-10: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-11: nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-12: nam mkha' mdzod ni stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-13: skad cig ma la byad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-14: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so; ;rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-15: rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-16: rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-17: lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-18: lag na rin chen phyag rgya che; ;zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-19: rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-20: bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-21: rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-22: thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-23: pri yang sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-24: dbang chen dang ni me las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-25: phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-26: rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-27: aom ratna p'a ni ra ma:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-29: rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-30: 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73a-31: rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-0: lag na rin po che sgrub @73b pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-1: chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-2: bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-3: stong gsum zhes ni bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-4: padma gcig gi steng na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-5: de yi steng du gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-6: chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-7: de steng du yang gsang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-8: me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-9: de yi steng du brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-10: rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-11: de yi steng du pad chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-13: de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-14: byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-15: rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-17: dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-18: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-19: de yi lag na phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-20: rdo rje dung du rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-21: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-22: rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-23: rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-24: slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-26: aom s'a ga ra ma ti sa ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-27: sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-28: shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-29: rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-30: shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-31: rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-32: thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal; ;dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-33: rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:73b-34: dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-3: ji snyed sa steng mtha' dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-4: khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-5: sa zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-6: mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-7: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-8: chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-9: bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-11: de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-12: yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-13: thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-14: rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-17: 'di ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-19: ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-20: rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-21: sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-22: dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-23: dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-24: dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-25: bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-26: nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-27: rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-28: bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-29: thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-30: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-31: des na rnam pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-32: rdo rje snying pos yang dag [?] byang [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-33: rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-34: sbyin pa byed pa de yis sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-35: rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-36: dbang chen me las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74a-37: nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-0: @74b zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-2: rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-3: 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-4: padma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can; ;phyag rgya de yi snying gar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-5: rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-8: aom ratna k'a ra hr'i:ratnam da nga sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-10: mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-11: sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-12: rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-13: rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das bskyed du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-19: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-20: khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:74b-21: rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-2: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-3: 'od zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-4: de yi mdun du bya ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-5: mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-6: de yi g-yas kyi gdan la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-7: rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-8: g-yon nyid du ni be con can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-9: rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-10: rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-11: rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan; ;phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-12: khro bo thams cad dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-13: de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-15: gzhan du med cing grangs med mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-16: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-17: yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-18: rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-19: dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-20: thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan; ;de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-21: dbyangs bdun par ni bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-22: he ru ka dpal rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-24: sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-26: 'jigs pa chen po'i dus can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-29: 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par brgyan; ;dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-30: gsal ba'i skra ldan stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-31: rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-32: thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75a-33: 'jigs pa chen po'i dus can gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-0: @75b rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-2: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-3: khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-4: rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i gdong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-5: gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-6: 'jig rten snang ba'i gar mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-7: phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-8: gcig tu gyur cing rnam pa mang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-9: rnam mang zhal ldan nga dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-10: sngo ser la sogs tha dad ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-11: zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-12: sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-13: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-14: khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che; ;shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-15: sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-16: phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-17: zhal drug pa ste gsus po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-18: char sprin mchog 'dra cher nag pa; ;dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-20: zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-21: khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-22: gshin rje mthar mdzad stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-23: de la sngags kyang aom a'a:h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-24: aom ya ma ma tha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-25: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um sarba sha tr'un na sh'a ya stambha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-26: sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-27: khyab bdag gdul mda' 'dul ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-28: gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:75b-31: dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-2: rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-3: shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-4: zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-5: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-6: de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-7: thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-8: 'jig rten gsum yang nges sreg mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-9: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-10: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-11: thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-12: gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-13: gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-14: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-15: khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-16: rin chen 'bar ba'i khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-19: de yi kha dog rnam par gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-20: drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-22: spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-23: phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-24: me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-25: li khri mdog ltar shin tu dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-26: de yis khro gnyer bsnyer pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-28: khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni; ;yang dang yang du bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-29: ma lus sa rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-30: son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-31: 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76a-32: skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-1: aom ka ni dhu ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-3: 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-4: sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-5: skye bo gzhan lta smros ci dgos; ;khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-6: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-8: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-9: rta mgrin zhes su bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-11: rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-12: chu dang gzi brjid can rag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-13: me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-15: gdug pa can rnams gdug pa 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-16: zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-17: stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-18: zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-19: bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-20: phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-21: seng+ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-22: rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-23: dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-24: skad cig nyid la gnas nas ni; ;thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-26: aom aa mri tongbha bo de bha be h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-27: aom aa mri tong bha ba h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-28: g-yas dang g-yon gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-29: g-yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar; ;khro bo'i skyil krung byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-30: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-32: sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:76b-33: rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-0: @77a *// stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-1: dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-2: tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-3: mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-4: sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-5: rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-6: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-7: gcig bu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-8: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur; ;khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-9: kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-10: thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-11: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-12: sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni; ;g-yo ba med par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-13: slob dpon mi g-yo khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-15: ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-16: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-17: pri yang ku ltar ljang ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-18: 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-19: ma lus pa yi sa rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-20: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-21: khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-22: pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-23: skye bo kun gyis yongs su gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-25: bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-27: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-29: khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77a-30: gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-0: dbang @77b du yang ni mdzad par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-1: rlung dang me las yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-2: 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-3: sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-4: lus dang ngag yid ge bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-5: dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-6: dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-7: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-8: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-9: khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-10: drag po thog ma tha ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-11: rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-13: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-16: gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-18: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-19: gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-20: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-21: rta babs kyis ni rnam bar mdzes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-22: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-23: dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-24: de yi dbus su pad chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-25: lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:77b-26: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-2: de yi dbus su rtag bri ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-3: dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-4: de yi nya 'khor thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-5: sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-6: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-7: shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-8: shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-9: thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-10: phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-11: go rim bzhin du rnam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-12: phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-13: kha dog dbye ba thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-14: rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-15: chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-16: de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-17: sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-18: shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-19: 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-20: 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-21: lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-22: shes rab chen po gzugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-23: 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-24: de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-25: sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten; ;sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-27: rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-28: du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-29: shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-30: sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-31: kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-32: sems can kun gyi thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78a-33: thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-0: sems @78b kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-1: zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-2: dri ma med cing ngang gis stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-3: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-4: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-5: thog ma tha ma med cing zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-6: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-7: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-8: bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-9: kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-10: chos kyi sku ru de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-11: dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-12: sems dang thams cad thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-13: yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-14: shes rab blo dang blo gros dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-15: lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun; ;kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-16: rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-17: mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-18: kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-19: rnam pa gnyis su de rab brtags; ;ji ltar bud shing la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-20: me yi sa bon gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-21: til la til mar ji bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-22: bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-23: me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-24: zho la mar gsar ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-25: rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-26: bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-27: gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-28: ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-29: de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-30: bsrungs pas yongs su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-31: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-32: yang nas yang du bsrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:78b-33: mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-0: @79a *// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-1: nam mkha' dri ma med brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-2: nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-3: 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-4: 'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-5: mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-6: kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-7: rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-8: mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-9: gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-10: mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-11: der gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-12: ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-13: shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te; ;gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-14: rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-15: rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-16: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-17: gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-18: yi ge de nyid de lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-19: gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-20: sde mtshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-21: thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-22: de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-23: shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-25: aom shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-27: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-29: 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-30: de nyid 'khor los rnam par bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-31: 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79a-32: grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-0: bstan @79b bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-1: shes bya thams cad khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-3: dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-5: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-6: rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-7: gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-8: zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-9: brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-10: sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-11: mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-12: sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-13: de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-14: nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-16: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarbba aartha s'a dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-17: 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-18: rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad; ;dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-19: bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-20: chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-21: sems can thams cad dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-22: dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste; ;bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-23: phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-24: rol cing g-yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:79b-25: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-3: thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-4: de la sogs pa sna tshogs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-5: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-6: nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-7: dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-8: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-9: gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-10: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-12: dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-13: rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-14: rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab; ;sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-15: che dang rin chen 'byung stobs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-16: tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-17: don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-19: dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-20: legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-21: rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-22: rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-23: rdo rje chos dang rno ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-24: rgyu dang smra mchog bdud rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-25: las dang go cha gnod sbyin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-26: khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-27: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-29: rdo rje h'um mdzod h'um mdzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-30: rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-31: he ru ka dpal rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-32: mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-33: khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:83b-34: rdo rje me ni 'od chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-2: ting nge 'dzin las dbang bsgyur ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-4: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i stobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-5: tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi; ;dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-6: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-7: dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-8: rjes dran drug phor gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-9: bsgom par bya ba rab tu gnas; ;de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-10: byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-11: mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-12: sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-14: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-15: stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-16: sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-17: byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po; ;rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-18: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-19: dgu la gnas par gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-20: bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-21: sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-22: so so yang dag rig pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-23: de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-24: skal pa chen po'i mi 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-25: mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-26: bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-27: tshad med pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-28: byang chub sems kyi skyed pa gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-29: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84a-30: nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-0: zag bcas zag pa @84b med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-1: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-2: dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-3: skye rgu'i bdag po skye rgu'i mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-4: mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-5: kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-6: sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-7: brjod du med cing spros pa bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-8: stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-9: tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-10: 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-11: de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-12: sa rnams kyi ni yongs su brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-13: sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-14: longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-15: rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-16: ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-17: mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-18: rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-19: padma'i sku ni snang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-20: thams cad sku ni las bzang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-21: rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-22: rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-23: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-24: byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-25: kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-26: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-27: gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-29: gsum pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-30: mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-31: rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhig sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-32: bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-33: bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-34: rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:84b-35: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-0: dbang bskur pa ni rab tu @85a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-2: pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-3: rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-4: bdag gi med cing yongs bzung mad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-5: bdun pa las kyi sa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-6: sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-7: brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-8: dpe ni de la yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-9: dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-10: dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-11: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-12: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-13: bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-14: sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-15: bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-16: rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-17: sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-19: sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-20: rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-21: thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-22: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las; sngags kyi de kho na nyid do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba @85b btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las gzhengs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-4: zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsungs bar bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-5: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa pa btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:85b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-0: thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par @86a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-1: rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-4: khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-7: de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-9: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-10: yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-11: dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-12: snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-13: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-14: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-15: thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86a-17: rdo rje snying po yongs bcug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-0: byang chub shing @86b gis nye bar mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-1: rdo rje dkyil 'khor gra rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-2: sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-3: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-4: rdo rje padma thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-5: las kyi rdo rje thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-7: dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-8: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-9: gos dang me tog chun pos spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-10: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-11: ral gri rdo rje autpa la; ;lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-12: chu yi gyad dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-13: mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-14: de la'ang sgo logs la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-15: mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya; ;de yi nang du bri bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-16: 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-17: cha brgyad dang ni yongs su ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-18: dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-19: rdo rje'i thig dang yongs su ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-21: de yi dbus su snying po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-22: rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-23: de yi steng du rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-24: rdo rje padma rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-25: padma'i steng du rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-27: dung dang kun da zla ba dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-29: de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-30: khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-31: zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-32: ting 'dzin ldan ni sdig pa bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-33: rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-35: rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:86b-36: spras pa rnam par dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-1: bya ba; ;yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-2: sa yi steng dang ldan pa g-yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-3: mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-4: drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-5: thig le n'a das legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-7: don can rab tu bskyed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-8: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-9: gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-10: chos kyi sku ni ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-12: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-16: dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-19: rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-0: sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de @87b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-3: de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-4: rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-5: sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-6: ae ma ho rdo rje snying po bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-7: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-8: snying po ye shes rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas; ;byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-10: sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-11: gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:87b-12: sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-0: de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' @88a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-1: chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas thon nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-5: ljang gu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi ye ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-8: rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-12: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-20: de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-24: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-28: de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88a-29: las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-1: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyung ngo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-9: rang gi rig pa mchog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-10: aom badzra dh'a t'i shva ri h'um badzri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-11: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-13: aom dzny'a na mushti tsitta badzrve badzri ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa zhes khya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-15: aom badzra rtna sam bha wa tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:88b-16: aom badzra dzny'a na garbha ti h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-1: gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshigs gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-2: aom aa mi t'a bh'a hr'i:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-3: aom badzra dha ri ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-5: aom sarbba aa mo gha siddhi aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-6: aom badzra mah'a ba le h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-8: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a dznya'a na badzra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-10: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89a-11: aom badzra sa ma t'a dzny'a na buddha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-0: de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs @89b pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-1: de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-2: aom sarbba dharma sa ma t'a dzny'a na badzra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-3: de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs par mdzad nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-5: aom sarbba stva sa ma t'a pra panytsa buddha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-6: de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga nas bka' nod cing 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:89b-10: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-0: lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gra rnams su de bzhin du rnam @90a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-2: sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-8: de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-9: aom badzra me ghe tam tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-10: 'khor lo'i mtshams su bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-11: aom sne ha badzri ni he /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-12: aom sha rad badzre aam aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-13: aom badzri ni k'i li k'i li h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grva dang mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-15: aom badzra gandhe h'um; aom ma dh'u badzri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-17: aom ma nod bha ba badzri ni h'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-18: aom badzra shi shi re ho ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i aom badzra dhu pe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-26: aom sa ma ya ho:su ra ta stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-27: dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-28: dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-29: ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90a-30: kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-0: dngos grub thams cad @90b rab sbyin dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-2: aom ae hye hi bha ga w'a na badzra aam ku sha dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-3: aom pra be sha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-4: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aom sa ma ye bandha tishtha bha ga wa'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-5: aom tu shyo ho: bha ga wan badzra a'a be sha aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-7: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-8: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba la byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-11: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-12: sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-13: de la dang po kho nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-14: dam tshig thams cad shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-15: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-16: dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-17: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:90b-19: de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-0: skyil krung bcas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub @91a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-2: lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams pa bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-6: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de rked ba'i phyogs su bzung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-8: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-9: rdo rje'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-10: de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-12: de nyid las legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-13: rdo rje legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-14: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-15: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-16: rdo rje bsdams pa las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-17: rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-18: rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-20: kha'i thad du bskor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-21: rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-22: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thad du bskor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-23: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-24: de nyid snying gar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-25: rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-26: de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-28: de nyid snying gar bsgreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-29: rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91a-30: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-0: las sna @91b tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-1: lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang snying ga dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-2: rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-3: rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-4: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-5: rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying gar bcangs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-6: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-7: de bzhin du sgeg mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-8: bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-9: rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-10: sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-11: dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-12: rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-13: phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-14: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-15: bdag 'di rdo rje'i gar byed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-16: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-17: phyag rgya bcing pa rab tu sbyar; ;thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-18: skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-19: de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-20: sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-21: sgeg pa'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-23: snyems bcas rdo rje can gyis dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-24: sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-25: ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-26: 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-27: btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-28: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:91b-29: bsdigs spyod rnams kyi lta stangs steng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-1: pa'i; ;shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-2: tshogs dang pho nya pho nya mo'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-3: lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-4: mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-8: mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-9: rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas; ;rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-10: mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-12: khro bas su ni yongs su bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-13: 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-14: mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-17: shin tu brang dka'i 'dod chags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-18: sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-19: rol cing rnal 'byor dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-20: g-yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-21: mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-22: lha mo pho nya tshogs kyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-23: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-24: lta stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-25: phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-26: skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-27: ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-28: dbang po la sogs rab dbye dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-29: de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-31: sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92a-32: tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-0: @92b sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-2: rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-3: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-6: yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-7: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-8: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-9: sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-10: dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-11: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-12: sna tshogs padmo de bzhin gzhan; ;dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-13: sangs rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-14: mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-15: 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-16: de sngags rtags su shes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-17: dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-18: de yi nye 'khor brgyad du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-19: 'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-20: 'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-21: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni; ;'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-22: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-23: padma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:92b-24: sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-1: bar bya; ;nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-3: dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-4: dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no; ;dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-7: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-8: yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-9: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-10: bya ba rdo rje h'um mdzad grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-11: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-12: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-13: de yi nang du 'khor lo ni; ;dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-14: de yi dbus su khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-15: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-16: khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-17: spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-18: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-19: rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-20: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-21: dka' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-22: sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-24: phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-25: zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-26: be con dang ni zhags par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-27: dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-28: gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs mdzub can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-29: phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93a-30: khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-0: mthe chung gnyis ni @93b mnyam sbyar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-1: lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sprel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-2: snying gar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-3: sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-9: phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-11: ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-12: de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-13: de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-15: de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-17: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-22: dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-23: de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-24: chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-25: de mi dbus su pad chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:93b-27: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-4: sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-5: mtha' yas rab 'byams rgya che ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-6: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-7: de yi sngags su yongs grags pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-14: de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-15: padmo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-16: bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-17: dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-18: mdun du bgrang phreng padma yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-26: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-27: gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-28: dpa' po rin chen snying po yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-31: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94a-32: de yi dbus su rin chen che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94b-8: rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:94b-9: g-yas su padma r'a ga ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:103a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:103b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje @103b rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:103b-1: de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:103b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:104b-1: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112a-21: thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-0: yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas @112b pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-1: stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-2: shes rab yongs su dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-3: aom aa we ni ka buddha dharma sa ma te aa: b'i ra h'um kham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-4: ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-5: de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-6: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-7: 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-8: mu khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-9: phyag dang zhabs gyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-10: zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-14: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dang pa'i rgyal po lta bu dra bas 'brel pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-16: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhan sha chags pa nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-17: bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-18: k'a tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:112b-20: bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-3: 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-5: 'di'i rting ba che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-6: sku che zhing drang ba nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-10: 'thas pa ma yin; legs par skyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-12: bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-13: mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-14: zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de; 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-15: ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-16: 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-17: ba spu rnams g-yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-18: de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-19: byin pa ri dvags ae na ya'i lta bu ste; bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dvags ae na ya rnams kyi lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-20: phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-21: rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-22: 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113a-23: spubs kyis rab tu g-yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-1: 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-3: shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-4: spu re re nas skyes pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-5: 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-6: smin ma'i dbus na mdzod bu can te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-7: 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g-yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-8: mdzod spu nyid gyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-9: sku stod seng+ge lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-10: 'di yi sku stod du yangs pa seng+ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-12: yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-14: 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-15: yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-17: ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-19: de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-21: bad kan la sogs ba rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:113b-22: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-1: tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-4: dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-6: 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-7: bya ka la pingka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-9: 'gram pa dag seng+ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-13: zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-15: ha cang dma' ba ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-17: mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi chos rnams su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-20: tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-25: ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-26: gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-27: rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-28: spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114a-29: gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114b-10: dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-086-001:114b-11: ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang /
